description:
cmd/gc: point "no new variables" error at right line number.

Fixes issue 3856.

messages.text: I thought something like this would need to be done. I feel less bad about struggling to do this with only a few changed lines.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: dsymonds@golang.org, golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM

Thanks very much for fixing this.

http://codereview.appspot.com/6455056/diff/3008/src/cmd/gc/dcl.c
File src/cmd/gc/dcl.c (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6455056/diff/3008/src/cmd/gc/dcl.c#newcode467
src/cmd/gc/dcl.c:467: yyerrorl(defn->lineno,"non-name %N on left side of :=", n);
Missing space. Will fix + submit.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=98788e8973f2 ***
